languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я не имею ни малейшего представления, почему друкари похитили солнце Райкада, словно исполняли пророчества культа. Быть может, сами ксеносы стали игрушкой в планах {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Или же предсказания Зари были на самом деле о деяниях друкари... одно могу утверждать с полной уверенностью — культ Последнего восхода не может состоять в союзе с ксеносами. Исключено".

{n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я не имею ни малейшего представления, почему друкари похитили солнце Райкада, словно исполняли пророчества культа. Быть может, сами ксеносы стали игрушкой в планах {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Или же предсказания Зари были на самом деле о деяниях друкари... одно могу утверждать с полной уверенностью — культ Последнего восхода не может состоять в союзе с ксеносами. Исключено".

languages.text: {n}海因里希仔细观察着你的表情。{/n}“我也不知道黑暗灵族为什么要窃取莱卡德的恒星，让那些邪教徒的预言成真。或许那些异形也是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}阴谋中的一部分，又或许‘极光’的预言指的就是黑暗灵族的暴行……不过，有件事情我非常确定，黑暗灵族与终末黎明邪教绝对不可能串通一气，这种情况根本不可能发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希仔细观察着你的表情。{/n}“我也不知道黑暗灵族为什么要窃取莱卡德的恒星，让那些邪教徒的预言成真。或许那些异形也是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}阴谋中的一部分，又或许‘极光’的预言指的就是黑暗灵族的暴行……不过，有件事情我非常确定，黑暗灵族与终末黎明邪教绝对不可能串通一气，这种情况根本不可能发生。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous étudie attentivement.{/n} « J'ignore pourquoi les Drukharis ont volé le soleil de Rykad et ainsi accompli la prophétie du culte. Peut-être que les xénos eux-mêmes ont fait le jeu du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}... ou peut-être que les prédictions d'Aurore n'étaient en fait qu'une description de ce que les Drukharis comptaient faire. Quoi qu'il en soit, il ne peut y avoir d'alliance entre le Culte de l'Aube finale et les xénos. C'est tout bonnement impossible. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous étudie attentivement.{/n} « J'ignore pourquoi les Drukharis ont volé le soleil de Rykad et ainsi accompli la prophétie du culte. Peut-être que les xénos eux-mêmes ont fait le jeu du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}... ou peut-être que les prédictions d'Aurore n'étaient en fait qu'une description de ce que les Drukharis comptaient faire. Quoi qu'il en soit, il ne peut y avoir d'alliance entre le Culte de l'Aube finale et les xénos. C'est tout bonnement impossible. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix estudia tu rostro.{/n} «No sé por qué los Drukhari han robado el sol de Rykad y cumplido las profecías del culto. Tal vez los xenos hayan sido víctima de los designios del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. O tal vez la adivinación de Aurora le enseñara los planes de los Drukhari... Solo puedo estar absolutamente seguro de una cosa: no hay ninguna alianza entre el Culto del Amanecer Final y los xenos. Es sencillamente imposible».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix estudia tu rostro.{/n} «No sé por qué los Drukhari han robado el sol de Rykad y cumplido las profecías del culto. Tal vez los xenos hayan sido víctima de los designios del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. O tal vez la adivinación de Aurora le enseñara los planes de los Drukhari... Solo puedo estar absolutamente seguro de una cosa: no hay ninguna alianza entre el Culto del Amanecer Final y los xenos. Es sencillamente imposible».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの表情を観察する。{/n}「我には、なぜデュカーリがライカドの太陽を奪い、教団の預言を成就させたのかはわかりません。おそらく異種族どもは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の思惑に嵌められたのでしょう。あるいは、オーロラのディビネーションが、実際にデュカーリの行動を言い当てていたのかもしれません。間違いなく言えるのは、最後の夜明け教団と異種族の間には、一切の同盟関係はないということです。単純にそれはありえません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの表情を観察する。{/n}「我には、なぜデュカーリがライカドの太陽を奪い、教団の預言を成就させたのかはわかりません。おそらく異種族どもは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の思惑に嵌められたのでしょう。あるいは、オーロラのディビネーションが、実際にデュカーリの行動を言い当てていたのかもしれません。間違いなく言えるのは、最後の夜明け教団と異種族の間には、一切の同盟関係はないということです。単純にそれはありえません」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum die Drukhari Rykads Sonne gestohlen und die Prophezeiung des Kults erfüllt haben. Vielleicht spielen die Xenos selbst eine Rolle in den Plänen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}. Oder vielleicht hat Auroras Prophetie tatsächlich die Taten der Drukhari beschrieben ... Ich weiß nur eines mit Gewissheit: Es gibt kein Bündnis zwischen dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung und den Xenos. Das ist schlicht unmöglich."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum die Drukhari Rykads Sonne gestohlen und die Prophezeiung des Kults erfüllt haben. Vielleicht spielen die Xenos selbst eine Rolle in den Plänen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}. Oder vielleicht hat Auroras Prophetie tatsächlich die Taten der Drukhari beschrieben ... Ich weiß nur eines mit Gewissheit: Es gibt kein Bündnis zwischen dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung und den Xenos. Das ist schlicht unmöglich."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, yüz ifadeni inceliyor.{/n} "Drukhariler neden Rykad'ın güneşini çaldı ve tarikatın kehanetlerinin gerçekleşmesine sebep oldu bilmiyorum. Belki zenolar, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} tasarımlarının gerçeğe dönüştürülebilmesi için manipüle edildiler. Belki de Aurora'nın öngörüleri aslında Drukharilerin eylemlerini anlatıyordur. Kesin olarak söyleyebileceğim tek bir şey var: Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ve zenolar arasında ittifak yok. İmkânsız."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies your expression.{/n} "I do not know why the Drukhari stole Rykad's sun and brought about the fulfilment of the cult's prophecies. Perhaps the xenos themselves have played into the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s designs. Or perhaps Aurora's divinations, in fact, described the Drukhari's actions... There is only one thing I can say with absolute certainty: there is no alliance between the Cult of the Final Dawn and the xenos. It is simply impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix yüz ifadeni inceliyor.{/n} "Drukhari neden Rykad'ın güneşini çaldı ve tarikatın kehanetlerinin gerçekleşmesine sebep oldu bilmiyorum. Belki zenolar, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın tasarımlarının gerçeğe dönüştürülebilmesi için manipüle edildiler. Ya da belki de Aurora'nın öngörüleri aslında Drukhari'nin eylemlerini tanımlıyordu. Kesin olarak söyleyebileceğim yalnızca tek bir şey var: Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ve zenolar arasında bir ittifak yok. Öyle bir şey imkânsız."
